snippet: Ape, a Czech German Shepherd equipped with a camera, was shot in the chest just as he breached the doorway of an abandoned bar where Kurt R. Myers was hiding.
abstract: Tactical dog named Ape is shot and killed while accompanying New York State Police and Federal Bureau of Investigation officers in raid on Herkimer, NY, hideaway of Kurt R Meyers; gunman, suspected of shooting six people in two upstate towns, four fatally, died in raid.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM

lead_paragraph: Ape, a Czech German Shepherd equipped with a camera, was shot in the chest just as he breached the doorway of an abandoned bar where Kurt R. Myers was hiding.

headline.seo: F.B.I. Dog Is Killed in Raid on Gunman
headline.main: F.B.I. Dog Is Killed in Raid on Hideaway
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Dog Is Killed in Raid on Gunman’s Hideaway
